title: 要从1.6.2的Spigot服升级为1.7.2的McpcPlus，需要注意什么
author: zhangxu128
txt_content:
原先是1.6.2的水龙头服务器，现在要换成1.7.2的McpcPlu.要求要保存存档、领地、地皮、以及玩家的登陆信息  ，需要注意些什么问题？或者说 应该怎么做

插件列表如下  

Ancient_Gates_171 (1).jar
AntiCheat.jar
AutoSaveWorld.jar
clear.jar
ClearLag1.6.2.jar
CoreProtect_2.08-CB1.6.1-汉化-by-橙子.jar
Essentials.jar
EssentialsAntiBuild.jar
EssentialsChat.jar
EssentialsGroupManager.jar
EssentialsProtect.jar
EssentialsSpawn.jar
Giants_5.0_1.4.7-1.6.2.jar
HerobrineAI for 1.6.2.jar
iConomy.jar
Lockette.jar
LogAll.jar
LordLib-1.2.0-b21.jar
Multiverse-Core-2.5.jar
NoSpawnChunks.jar
PerformanceMonitor1.7.1.cn.jar
playerLogin.jar
PlotMe.jar
PPMOTDv39.jar
pTweaks.jar
RandomPlacer (1).jar
Residence.jar
RichAutoMessage.jar
RideMe (1).jar
SignShop.jar
TreeAssist.jar
Vault.jar
VipZero_CN_Mayomi.jar
WorldEdit.jar
脚本方块.jar


求帮忙

replies.txt_content: 更换插件，服务端核心没了
